name: Principal Charming
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), David M. Stern
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: After attending a co-worker's wedding, Selma begins to fear she will die alone. However, when Homer tries to set her up with Principal Skinner, he falls for Patty instead.
